name: Spectral Links
description:
The player character is joined to the spiritual world and uses this connection to start a new agency. The player helps to sever the connections of ghosts and sprits from the human world and move them on. All of the ghosts are connected to the house in more ways than one. Will you also see and feel all the connections? 

================================
